# @mastra/core Documentation

> Embedded documentation for coding agents

## Quick Start

```bash
# Read the skill overview
cat docs/SKILL.md

# Get the source map
cat docs/SOURCE_MAP.json

# Read topic documentation
cat docs/<topic>/01-overview.md
```

## Structure

```
docs/
├── SKILL.md           # Entry point
├── README.md          # This file
├── SOURCE_MAP.json    # Export index
├── agents/ (28 files)
├── ai-sdk/ (5 files)
├── auth/ (6 files)
├── cli/ (1 files)
├── client-js/ (1 files)
├── configuration.mdx/ (1 files)
├── core/ (32 files)
├── deployer/ (3 files)
├── evals/ (19 files)
├── guides/ (1 files)
├── index.mdx/ (1 files)
├── logging/ (1 files)
├── mcp/ (2 files)
├── memory/ (7 files)
├── observability/ (22 files)
├── processors/ (13 files)
├── rag/ (7 files)
├── server/ (13 files)
├── storage/ (9 files)
├── streaming/ (10 files)
├── templates/ (1 files)
├── tools/ (6 files)
├── tools-mcp/ (3 files)
├── vectors/ (4 files)
├── voice/ (13 files)
├── workflows/ (30 files)
```

## Version

Package: @mastra/core
Version: 1.0.0-beta.23
